title: StackItUp
author: StackItUp
content: did you piece of shit just wrote negative feedback of me asking for immediate feedback lol?who the F you are to talk to me this way?I never asked you anything you asshole.i just explained of why you are corrupted and how you buy your trust.Who cares that you will not allow me to bet? ME? lol¬†what a joke you are.I DO NOT CARE.you just left false feedback and just showing that you are corrupted mfer and now go F Yourself

comments.author: MoparMiningLLC
comments.body: it was not false. you made several posts now questioning why I did not give you "feedback" stating it misrepresent you in some fashion. I will not be bullied by you into giving you feedback simply because you feel it appropriate. I will also no further respond to your trolling banter.As for losing a customer, who wants customers that badger them, insult them, and cause conflict? I do not need the sats that bad, for sure.

comments.author: StackItUp
comments.created_time: November 28, 2023, 06:20:27 PMLast edit: November 29, 2023, 02:16:34 PM by hilariousandco
comments.body: Quote from: StackItUp on November 28, 2023, 02:30:17 PMBtw, Mopar, bought from you many times, somehow i do not have feedback from You. But other old members got your feedback. wanted to ask what money/bitcoins they have used and how those coins were different from mine?(i would adjust this in the future and would buy and prepare the same bitcoins as they were using). Now, do not run leaving that feedback, no need. just saying.this was written in public just as irony as how fucked you are. now tell me where did i asked or insisted something? Quote from: MoparMiningLLC on November 28, 2023, 06:19:45 PMit was not false. you made several posts now questioning why I did not give you "feedback" stating it misrepresent you in some fashion. I will not be bullied by you into giving you feedback simply because you feel it appropriate. I will also no further respond to your trolling banter.As for losing a customer, who wants customers that badger them, insult them, and cause conflict? I do not need the sats that bad, for sure. Yes you piece of shit. i wanted my receipt and was waiting for it 2-3 years.NOW I GOT IT.All i cared for you to write that we made transactions, never asked but patiently waited. You wrote today! thank you for that, and the rest said in that feedback i do not care. You are Fake in what you do. You know that feedback is fake, live with that.You are a peasant to me. I have much larger network of people on telegram than you do here. at the end of the day i am still StackBTCbeing that said,FUCK OFF

comments.author: anonymousminer
comments.body: Quote from: StackItUp on November 28, 2023, 06:21:17 PM at the end of the day i am still StackBTCLMAO... what a clown!

comments.body: COPY PASTE FROM THE FEEDBACK HE LEFT ME:"I would suggest limiting activity with someone who feels it necessary to push for immediate feedback - I will no longer be dealing with this individual in any fashion."WHERE DID I PUSHED, ASKED, INSISTED, FORCED you to do anything you peace of shit?I explained of how you are corrupted, and now you are attacking me with your DT feedback weight,FUCK YOU PEASANT only by saying a word "immediate" on a 2-3 year old trading activity with you - shows you are corrupted AF.immediate.... Joining Mopar forces?let me remind you you fucker that this is me who gifted you the rare coin from the set you was looking for, and we made extreme good trade to your favor.this is your feedback too?FUCK OFF ASSHOLE

(asking for a friend)Quote from: MoparMiningLLC on November 28, 2023, 06:19:45 PMyou made several posts now questioning why I did not give you "feedback" Show those posts please.Thing is , that you reverted my words and conversation of how you wanted.Differently from what you say, in my words i was not asking a feedback but saying that you are the person who is farming DT feedbacks in my opinion and you want to have less "opponents" and you select not to rate newbies based on your bullshit thinking that you would be responsible if something when all we know you wouldnt.Maybe you are legendary, its okay, but it does not make you a better person.You are just a human, like all of us.Your feedback has power by stopping customers to buy from you just because they asked a question with irony. well done.and believe me least what i care is your neutral feedback, after reading you negatively rating first Titan BTC victim for being a victim- you have me no surprises.Quote from: anonymousminer on November 28, 2023, 06:36:28 PMthe fact that you made that comment like you are Satoshi or something just made you look like a clownQuote from: StackItUp on November 28, 2023, 03:23:46 PMI reserve the right to be identified as satoshi nakamoto for the next 24h.I did had/have a reserved right

comments.author: Lesbian Cow
comments.body: This should be in the Reputation section which is more equipped to deal with such nonsense.https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?board=129.0OP, you sound pretty unhinged, maybe take a time out and collect your thoughts a little better.

comments.author: StackItUp
comments.body: Quote from: 2stout on November 28, 2023, 08:21:33 PMMan, this has rainbowsky vibes...Telling me to go relax and at the same time throwing accusations of me being not me. WTF?May i ask is this accusation out of nowhere looks OK to you?Why do you think you have a right to do that to me?I do not give a shit of what vibes someone gives you. pack up your horses and leave.

comments.author: BenCodie
comments.created_time: November 28, 2023, 08:57:28 PMLast edit: November 28, 2023, 09:12:57 PM by BenCodie
comments.body: Mopar changed his feedback to neutral since you started this thread.All of the CAPS LOCK won't change that from now on.Chill out, move on, keep stacking your Bitcoins...If you want my friendly advice, lock this thread before people who are actually bad start judging your character or trustworthiness just based on the way you are posting...they haven't come here yet, but if the thread isn't locked in time...they will. Save yourself the trouble  Good luck.

comments.author: StackItUp
comments.created_time: November 28, 2023, 09:07:09 PMLast edit: November 28, 2023, 09:26:07 PM by StackItUp
comments.body: Quote from: BenCodie on November 28, 2023, 08:57:28 PMMopar changed his feedback to neutral since you started this thread.All of the CAPS LOCK won't change that from now on.Chill out, move on, keep stacking your Bitcoins...If you want my friendly advice, lock this thread before people much who are actually bad start judging your character or trustworthiness just based on the way you are posting. He has not changed it.it is exact feedback i was talking about.i always was generous, friendly, respectful and honest to my trade partners. including Mopar.Him telling i insulted him is complete nonsense as anyone who knows me- knows i respect people.The feedback he left is false, minimum at few places.i repeat that i never asked him anything but he wrote that i did.He also wrote "immediately" on 2-3 years old event.he has to write accurately or else he is fake AF.i could also bet if i was in DT he had never ever moved a finger to write anything negative about me because he would be afraid to do that and get red paints back.He did that just to show he is "greater" than me here on the forum.childish behaviour.i can absorb that and live with that.For the end: I do not care if Mopar trust me lol, why should i?stupid to believe the other way when all the time i was first to send him money.so what should make me think i care if you trust me?im sending, im risking. all i care if i trust you.and if you wonder of why i have not left a positive feedback for you as a seller for such a long time, just points to my statement of where i said "if people will notice you are filtering them, they will adjust actions",so i just decided not to buy from you for a few years just because you see some people better than other and thats against my mindset.Keep filtering people good/bad , hero/new, rich/poor and i can bet your sales will get lower.good luck

comments.author: BenCodie
comments.body: Quote from: StackItUp on November 28, 2023, 09:07:09 PMQuote from: BenCodie on November 28, 2023, 08:57:28 PMMopar changed his feedback to neutral since you started this thread.All of the CAPS LOCK won't change that from now on.Chill out, move on, keep stacking your Bitcoins...If you want my friendly advice, lock this thread before people much who are actually bad start judging your character or trustworthiness just based on the way you are posting. He has not changed it.it is exact feedback i was talking about.i always was generous, friendly, respectful and honest to my trade partners. including Mopar.Him telling i insulted him is complete nonsense as anyone who knows me- knows i respect people.The feedback he left is false, minimum at few places.i repeat that i never asked him anything but he wrote that i did.He also wrote "immediately" on 2-3 years old event.he has to write accurately or else he is fake AF.i could also bet if i was in DT he had never ever moved a finger to write anything negative about me because he would be afraid to do that and get red paints back.He did that just to show he is "greater" than me here on the forum.childish behaviour.i can absorb that and live with that.good luckOh, the feedback is neutral.People leave those like the weather changing stack, don't worry too much about it. He can have that opinion, others might not share it. It isn't negative feedback (yes it has negative sentiment, but it isn't a red trust).With everything else you've said, it's hard for me to have a say as I can't see all of these things or I haven't dug deep enough. All I know is that it's unlikely you'll change his mind at this point and you have to ask yourself - Is this battle really going to be worth your valuable time in comparison to just continuing business as usual, and ignoring the feedback?I learnt that hardway with JollyGood, that you're better just to move on. Hopefully you don't have to learn the hard way too. Sometimes, you can't change peoples mind and there's no point trying. It might even wind up bringing more trouble.Good luck

comments.author: MoparMiningLLC

Save yourself the trouble  Good luck.I did not "change" it - it was always neutral. And I had no issues until he became disrespectful and was consistently derailing numerous threads attacking the OP's as well.Having an opinion is great, even welcomed - slamming it home with post after post - nah, not so great or respectful.

comments.author: StackItUp
comments.created_time: November 28, 2023, 09:53:36 PMLast edit: November 29, 2023, 07:40:17 AM by StackItUp
comments.body: Quote from: MoparMiningLLC on November 28, 2023, 09:44:41 PMQuote from: BenCodie on November 28, 2023, 08:57:28 PMMopar changed his feedback to neutral since you started this thread.All of the CAPS LOCK won't change that from now on.Chill out, move on, keep stacking your Bitcoins...If you want my friendly advice, lock this thread before people who are actually bad start judging your character or trustworthiness just based on the way you are posting...they haven't come here yet, but if the thread isn't locked in time...they will. Save yourself the trouble  Good luck.I did not "change" it - it was always neutral. And I had no issues until he became disrespectful and was consistently derailing numerous threads attacking the OP's as well.Having an opinion is great, even welcomed - slamming it home with post after post - nah, not so great or respectful.i left you the same feedback.changed just one single word, instead of your "feedback" i applied you "payment". looks perfect and would work with about any other word.look you fool, i dont care if you dont like that me was telling something to other people that might be your friends.i do not give a shit.They advertised wrongly and i pointed them out to not repeat that again or if they would do: to describe their topics properly so that my head wasnt pumped of your ads that i dont want by accidentally opening threads with misleading topics/info.also, i do not care if you trust me.i was sending money to you.i was risking.so why should i care if you trust me?your trust to me plays ZERO role in any situation that we EVER had.You think you are great, ok let it be. be great. i dont mind. just dont teach me how to live.none of you told a single word that those people and their style of advertising free goods that were not that free- wrong.nobody ever said its wrong to reserve the rights. Soon we will have "right reservation" service.paid service to remind what rights someone had reserved and when they are about to expire.and when i say "fake mods" i mean it, because i find no other normal explanation of how my post that was deleted different from those that i commented on todaywhen you say not respectful. this is exactly what i meant when saying that you leave feedback "paid" on just some of the people when leaving others who also "paid" questioning what do they did wrong. do they paid too little? not on time? or do you think of you writing of a successful trade would make you attached to someone for the rest of your life lol? so yeah, you are disrespectful

comments.author: MoparMiningLLC
comments.body: I do not push for immediate payment though. I have allowed several people to go months. However, it is typical when you pay for something to well um, pay. It is not mandatory or required that someone leave you positive trust rating (you call it feedback, but this is not ebay, it is not feedback) for a single transaction. Yes, we had a couple more recently and I would have left you positive feedback as you have acted trustworthy. But now attacking people who are giving back to the community (simply because you are not eligible to enter) repeatedly and then asking me where your feedback was and then insinuating that others are somehow getting feedback while you are not as if I was treating you differently when it is simply not true. I typically wait until many transactions occur and time has passed. I probably would have left you a positive trust rating at the start of next month. Your insinuation about everyone being corrupt and that people are censoring poor ol' you is just over the top.What I do here is mostly a service to the community - I do not profit from my actions here on the forums. Most sales are at cost and sometimes below cost. You were wrong to attack the raffle makers - you were wrong to ask me about not leaving you positive trust rating. You were wrong to leave the feedback on me that you left, it is not true (while what I left you is very true) and is done out of spite and retaliation. I will not feed your delusions and will not respond to your gibberish further. And yes, I blocked you on telegram. You already went off about the forums corruption there as well. Life is too short for this drama. You can have it - I choose not to.

You can have it - I choose not to.of course it is not mandatory to threat every your client well.only a stupid person would threat them differently.My point that if you have rated the old member but not rated the new member in the same trade they both did with you. And the exact single function they both had is just pay and nothing else. what made person "a" to be better than "b".trying to understand your business mindset and trying not to believe that you do it just because there is nothing "good" you can get from the newbie.and after such disrespect you expect same people to be coming back and buying? OK.

comments.author: The Sceptical Chymist
comments.body: OP, stop bumping this thread with multiple posts.¬† If you need to respond to several members, do it in one post.¬† You're not allowed to bump your own thread more than once per 24 hours.And since this seems to be a Collectibles-related matter, I've got no dog in the fight and no bias toward or against anyone posting here.¬† So I have to say that your posts are juvenile, and your response to a neutral feedback looks very much like a small child throwing a tantrum in a room full of people who aren't his parents and don't love him.¬† In other words, you haven't gotten any support; you're not going to get any; grow a spine and stop whining about a neutral when you've got negative feedback from members like Foxpup.¬† Your bearing is that of a retard.
